title: vandE mAtharam jaya jaya
sahitya:
vandE mAtaram jaya jaya vandE mAtaram
caraNam 1 jaya jaya bhArata jaya jaya bhArata jaya jaya bhAtara jaya jaya jaya jaya
   caraNam 2  Ariya bhUmiyil nAriyarum nara sUriyarum shollum vIriya vAcakam
   caraNam 3  nondE pOyinum vendEmAyinum nandE sattar uvandE sholvadu
   caraNam 4  onrAi ninrini venrAyinum uyir shenrAyinum vali kunrAdOduvam
